questions.question: Which sentence shows a past possibility that didn't happen?
options: He might have forgotten his keys.
questions.answer: He might have forgotten his keys.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'She _____ call us later if she finishes early.'
Which sentence expresses a weak possibility in the present?
options: They might be sleeping right now.
They will be sleeping right now.
questions.answer: They might be sleeping right now.
